featured.title: JIFBW 2026: Ushering in a New Era of Sustainable Craftsmanship
featured.excerpt: The upcoming Jepara International Furniture & Biennale Week is set to be the largest city-based exhibition in Southeast Asia, focusing on eco-friendly wood sourcing and authentic heritage.

news.title: The Rise of Scandinavian-Jepara Fusion Design
news.description: Discover how local artisans are blending minimalist Nordic aesthetics with intricate Indonesian carving techniques.

news.title: Logistics Boom: New Export Routes from Tanjung Emas
news.description: Improved infrastructure around Central Java is significantly reducing shipping times for international furniture buyers.

news.title: Traditional Carving Techniques: A Vanishing Art Recovered
news.description: Young apprentices in Jepara are revitalizing 500-year-old carving styles for the luxury global market.

news.title: JIFBW 2026 Digital Portal: Now Open for Visitor Pre-Registration
news.description: Get early access to exhibitor catalogs and showroom locations by registering through our new hybrid portal.
